p: The results of the linear mixed models show that specialist bryophyte species cover is not affected by mowing ( Table 2). However, mowing resulted in a decline in shrub cover, and an increase in specialist fen vascular plant species cover at the continental site, and a decline in M. caerulea cover at both sites, particularly the oceanic site (see also Fig 2). There was also a significant interaction between mowing treatment and time for the change in M. caerulea cover.
